title: Jobless rate drops to 3.9 pct
text:
Jobless rate drops to 3.9 pct 11:22am EDT - 01:04
The U.S. unemployment rate fell to 3.9 percent, the lowest in 17-1/2 years. As Fred Katayama reports, job growth accelerated in April, but not as fast as expected. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The U.S. unemployment rate fell to 3.9 percent, the lowest in 17-1/2 years. As Fred Katayama reports, job growth accelerated in April, but not as fast as expected. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2FIIPMc
